name: Project Boost (itch) (Hungry Ibis Productions)
description:
PROJECT BOOST is a Casual Action Game in which you play as a rocket ship, using the rocket's thrusters to propel yourself through dangerous caves. 

Safely steer the rocket through the caves to avoid colliding with walls and objects. Even the slightest collision can cause the rocket to explode upon impact.

Your objective is to make the rocket safely touch down upon the landing pad. 

See if you can make it through all the Levels. It's much more challenging than you think.

CONTROLS - KEYBOARD


  • Rotate Left: 'A' or 'Left'
  • Rotate Right: 'D' or 'Right'
  • Thruster: 'W' or 'Up' or Space
  • Return to Main Menu: Escape

The game is best played locally, so you should scroll down to the 'Download' button to play it on your computer for the best experience.

Support me on Patreon!



Visit my HungryIbis website!

TRIBUTE

I made this game a few years ago in my Gamedev.tv course the "Complete C# Unity Game Developer 3D". This course is amazing; I could not rate it any higher. If you plan on getting into Game Development, take this course. The lessons are professionally done and set at your own pace, so you can get through it however quickly you like. The course is a one-off payment that you then have for life, and they also recreate the course every few years to keep up with the new content in unity, so it always stays relevant.
